name: ulog_to_csv
short_description: Convert data in ULog files to CSV.
description:
This Action converts data in ULog files (.ulg) to CSV. Under the hood, it uses the [pyulog](https://github.com/PX4/pyulog) library.

By default, all messages will be extracted from the input file(s). You can use the parameters to extract specific message types, and also provide a specific time range if needed. These help to reduce the size of the resulting file.

parameters.name: MESSAGES
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of messages to extract. For example: battery_status,actuator_armed

parameters.name: DELIMITER
parameters.description: Delimiter in CSV, defaults to comma
